posts.post_content: I love the artwork, the flash is a nice touch as is the ability of potential board wipe. My only problem is that this guy is only a 5/5. If you're point in the artwork is to make the creature look bigger than the average dragon than shouldn't it be at least a 6/6? Other than that great card.
